org.semanticweb.yars.nx.parser

Class NxParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.semanticweb.yars.nx.parser.NxParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Node[]>, java.util.Iterator<Node[]>

    public class NxParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Iterator<Node[]>, java.lang.Iterable<Node[]>
    NxParser is a non-validating N1, N2, N3, N4, Nx parser. Assumes the data to be formatted according to NTRIPLES spec, including it to be encoded in ASCII with Unicode characters properly escaped as in the NTRIPLES spec. Deviates from NTRIPLES spec in two points known so far:
    • Only space delimits parts of a statement, not space or tab.
    • Previous to the full stop at the end of a statement, there must be a space.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Aidan Hogan, Andreas Harth, Tobias Kaefer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean DEFAULT_PARSE_DTS
      Deprecated. 
      If you call a literal's Literal.getDatatype() method, you are presented with the data type, if there is one. So the processing of that is to be moved.
